name: Ice Cream Scoop Rush - Free
description:
Ice Cream Scoop Rush - A fast paced fun game of serving ice cream combos.

Enjoy the full game for FREE !!!

Become the ultimate scoop master as you help Uncle Ben run his ice cream shop.
You have a chance to show your skill over thirty days as you unlock new flavors, toppings, sauces and even experience new quirky customers.
This ice cream business is all about concentration, speed, memory and fun.

Features
** Fun for all ages
** Simple sequence tap game play
** New items to unlock
** Remember what your customers like to earn large tips
